            (= (mod x n) 0))]
    (loop [acc [] cnt 1 coll coll]
      (if (empty? coll)
        acc

          (recur acc (inc cnt) (next coll))
          (recur (conj acc (first coll)) (inc cnt) (next coll))))
        )))

(fn
  [arr n]
  (
    (fn
      [res arr counter]
      (if (empty? arr)
        res
        (recur
          (if (>= counter n)
            res
            (conj
              res
              (first arr)))
          (rest arr)
          (if (>= counter n)
            1
            (inc counter)))))
    []
    arr
    1))

(fn drop-nth [col n]
  (letfn [(do-drop-nth [res col counter]
                       (if (empty? col)
                         res
                         (let [[head & tail] col inc-counter (inc counter)]
                           (if (= (mod counter n) 0)
                             (do-drop-nth res tail inc-counter)
                             (do-drop-nth (conj res head) tail inc-counter)))))]
    (do-drop-nth [] col 1)))

      (conj 
        (dropnth (rest li) (+ c 1) n ) 
        (first li) ) ) ) ) )

  ([s n i]

        (cons (first s) (drop-n (rest s) n (inc i)))))))

(fn drop-every--mask
  [coll n] {:pre [(integer? n), (pos? n)]}
  ;; This mask (a lazy sequence) has a 0 if we are dropping the corresponding
  ;; element of coll, and a 1 otherwise; e.g., when n = 3, the mask is:
  ;;   (0 0 1 0 0 1 0 0 1 ...)
  (let [mask (drop 1 (cycle (cons 0 (repeat (dec n) 1))))]
    (mapcat #(if (= %2 0) [] [%1]) coll mask)))

(fn dropnth [x n]
    "Drops every nth item of a vector x."
    (if (< (count x) n)
      x
      (loop [counter 0, result []]
        (if (< counter (count x))
          (if (= (mod counter n) (- n 1))
            (recur (inc counter) result)
            (recur (inc counter) (conj result (get (vec x) counter))))
          result))))

(fn drop-every-nth
    ([coll n]
     (drop-every-nth coll n 1))
    ([coll n i]
     (lazy-seq
      (when-let [s (seq coll)]
        (if (= i n)
          (drop-every-nth (rest s) n 1)
          (cons (first s) (drop-every-nth (rest s) n (inc i))))))))

  (loop [i 1, remaining ell, result []]
    (if (empty? remaining)
      result
      (recur
        (inc i)
        (rest remaining)
        (if (= 0 (mod i n)) result (conj result (first remaining)))))))

(fn [coll n]
  (let [icoll (map-indexed vector coll)]
    (map (fn [[_ x]] x) (filter (fn [[a b]] (not  (= (mod (inc a) n) 0))) icoll))))

(fn [xs n]
  (mapcat (partial take (dec n)) (partition-all n xs)))

(fn [col n]
   (mapcat #(take (dec n) %)
   (partition-all n col))
 )

#(for [[x y]
(remove (fn [[x]] (= 0 (rem (inc x) %2))) (map-indexed vector %1))]
  y)
(fn [x n] (mapcat butlast (partition n n [1] x)))

(fn [coll n]
  (let [one (map vector (iterate inc 1) coll )
        two (map #(when-not (zero? (rem  (first %) n )) (second %)) one)
        three (remove nil? two)]
    three))

(fn [l x]
  (let [cmpfn #(if (< (count %) x) % (butlast %))]
  (flatten (map cmpfn (partition-all x l)))))

(fn drop-every-nth [xs n]
  (loop [xs  xs
         i   (dec n)
         acc []]
    (cond
      (empty? xs) acc
      (> i 0)     (recur (rest xs)
                         (dec i)
                         (conj acc (first xs)))
      :else       (recur (rest xs)
                         (dec n)
                         acc))))

(fn [xs n]
  (keep-indexed #(when (< 0 (mod (inc %1) n))
                   %2)
                xs))
#(keep-indexed (fn [index t](if (not= (rem (inc index) %2) 0) t)) %1)

#(
 loop [x 0, res []]
 (if (>= x (count %1)) res (if (zero? x) (recur (inc x) (conj res (%1 0))) (if (= 0 (mod (+ 1 x) %2)) (recur (inc x) res) (recur (inc x) (conj res (%1 x))))))
 )
(fn [seq n] (remove nil? (map-indexed #(if (= 0 (mod (inc %1) n)) nil %2) seq)))

(fn [coll n]
  (mapcat #(if (= (count %) n) (butlast %) %)
          (partition-all n coll)))

(fn [x y] (vec (map
	(apply assoc {} (interleave (vec (range (count x))) x) )
	(filter (fn [z] (pos? (rem (inc z) y))) (range (count x)))
	)))

(fn [s n] (keep-indexed 
  #(if (pos? (mod (inc %1) n)) %2) s))
